snippet: Ms. Figes was a refugee from Nazi Germany who became an acclaimed novelist, memoirist and critic best known for an influential feminist treatise, “Patriarchal Attitudes.”
abstract: Eva Figes, a refugee from Nazi Germany who became an acclaimed novelist, memoirist and critic, dies at age 80.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Figes was a refugee from Nazi Germany who became an acclaimed novelist, memoirist and critic best known for an influential feminist treatise, “Patriarchal Attitudes.”

headline.seo: Eva Figes, Author and Feminist, Dies at 80
headline.main: Eva Figes, Author and Feminist, Dies at 80
headline.print_headline: Eva Figes, Author and Feminist, Dies at 80
